      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static <V> int compare(V v1, V v2)
      Compare two object if v1 > v2 return 1 if v1 is not null, v2 is null return 1 if v1 = v2, return 0 if v1 is null, v2 is null return 0 if v1 < v2, return -1 if v1 is null, v2 is not null return -1

      return v1.

      • getSharedPreferences

        public static java.lang.String getSharedPreferences(android.content.Context context,
                                    java.lang.String fileName,
                                    java.lang.String parameterName)
                                             throws java.lang.ClassCastException
        Retrieve a String value from the preferences.
        参数:
        context -
        fileName -
        parameterName -
        返回:
        Returns the preference value if it exists, or "".
        抛出:
        java.lang.ClassCastException - Throws ClassCastException if there is a preference with this name that is not a String.

      • getSharedPreferences

        public static java.lang.String getSharedPreferences(android.content.Context context,
                                    java.lang.String fileName,
                                    java.lang.String parameterName,
                                    java.lang.String otherDefaultReturns)
        See also getSharedPreferences(android.content.Context, String, String)
        参数:
        context -
        fileName -
        parameterName -
        otherDefaultReturns -
        返回:
        Returns the preference value if it exists, or otherDefaultReturns.

      • compare

        public static <V> int compare(V v1,
              V v2)
        Compare two object if v1 > v2 return 1 if v1 is not null, v2 is null return 1 if v1 = v2, return 0 if v1 is null, v2 is null return 0 if v1 < v2, return -1 if v1 is null, v2 is not null return -1

        return v1.Comparable.compareTo(Object)

        参数:
        v1 -
        v2 -
        返回:
